verbose_text: This motif is highly conserved through all mammalian orthologs and sequentially participates in the interaction of BST-2 with the clathrin adaptors AP-2, which mediates internalization by endocytosis, and AP-1, which retrieves BST-2 to the TGN.
evidence: interaction of BST-2 with the clathrin adaptors AP-2, which mediates internalization by endocytosis, and AP-1
